templates.template: select distinct table_name, constraint_name, column_name, r_table_name, position, constraint_type from ( SELECT uc.table_name, uc.constraint_name, cols.column_name, (select table_name from user_constraints where constraint_name = uc.r_constraint_name) r_table_name, (select column_name from user_cons_columns where constraint_name = uc.r_constraint_name and position = cols.position) r_column_name, cols.position, uc.constraint_type FROM user_constraints uc inner join user_cons_columns cols on uc.constraint_name = cols.constraint_name where constraint_type != 'C' ) start with table_name = '${table}' and column_name = '${column}' connect by nocycle prior table_name = r_table_name and prior column_name = r_column_name;
